meta.title: Ayoub Abbani | Software Engineer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing software engineering work and skills

about.bio: Results-driven Software Engineer with 4+ years of cross-industry experience across the Automotive and Aviation sectors. Focused on embedded and application/system-level development, with expertise in C/C++, Python, tooling, SW integration & testing across end-to-end development.
focus: Embedded software development and system-level integration
Application development with C/C++ and Python
Test automation and CI/CD pipeline implementation

experience.title: C++ Software Engineer
experience.description: Contributing to the end-to-end system level software development & maintenance of the SASS-C software by building algorithms that provide interoperable top-level functionality to civil and military Air Navigation Service Providers (ANSPs), R&D organizations and the ATM industry, to evaluate and model sensor performance, including Primary & Secondary Surveillance Radar (PSR/SSR), ADS-B, and MLAT data.
achievements: Redesigned Radar Coverage Visualization (VERIF 24.04): Developed a visualization graphic with C++ Qt 5.15/QML, with advanced radar detection range computations (LoS, Visibility, horizon)
Extended VERIF Inputs (VERIF 24.04.1): Implemented a backend support in C++ for GEOTIFF files, enabling high-resolution radar visualization and reconstruction
Improved Trajectory Reconstruction (VERIF 24.10): Improved aircraft trajectory simulation through a Deep Learning/RNN submodule, prototyped in Python and implemented in C++
Implemented Data Import Module (VERIF 24.10): Delivered EDIS, a web/desktop using Python, Electron and Flask, to manage and integrate Flight/GPS data in VERIF-DB

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: As a Software Engineer, contributed to the development of HiL/SiL Embedded SW & System Validation for Powertrain.
achievements: Designed and maintained in-house software/tools using C/C++, Qt5, and the Win32 API
Developed automated test scenarios in AutomationDesk using the ASAM XiL API and Python 3, deployed across multiple ECUs and powertrain projects in SIL/HIL environments
Contributed to vehicle modelling and simulation using Matlab/Simulink
Maintained comprehensive documentation of test procedures, software versions, and configurations
Collaborated with global, cross-functional teams including control and validation engineers, operating in an Agile workflow

experience.title: Software Integration Engineer
experience.description: As an Embedded Test & Integration Engineer in ICE Projects within the Powertrain Team.
achievements: Developed test strategies and test case scenarios based on system and design specifications
Executed test plans on HiL benches and/or in-vehicle (ViL) environments
Created automated test scripts using C/CAPL and Python
Conducted root cause analysis and documented test results
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and set up the test environment, materials, and requirements

education.degree: MEng, Engineer's degree in Mechatronics Engineering
BSc, Bachelor of Science in Applied Physics
